description: Test your knowledge on the world of sports, from famous athletes to legendary moments.

questions.question: Which country has won the most FIFA World Cup titles?
questions.funFact: Brazil has won the FIFA World Cup five times, more than any other nation.
questions.story: Brazil's dominance in football began in 1958 when they won their first World Cup, led by a 17-year-old Pel√©, who became a global icon of the sport.

questions.question: Which sport is known as the 'king of sports'?
questions.funFact: Soccer is the most popular sport in the world, with over 4 billion fans globally.
questions.story: Soccer's global appeal can be traced back to its simple rules and minimal equipment, making it accessible to people from all walks of life. Its first recorded origins date back to ancient China.

questions.question: Which athlete has won the most Olympic medals in history?
questions.funFact: Michael Phelps has won a total of 28 Olympic medals, including 23 golds.
questions.story: Phelps' journey to Olympic greatness began in 2000 at the age of 15. His most notable performance was at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, where he won 8 gold medals, breaking multiple world records.
